surgery 
intralesional chemotherapy with gliadel wafer
radiation therapy
• complex enhancing lesion right basal ganglia and temporal lobe.
• lesion contains both "cystic" and solid components.
• marked perilesional edema present.
• no restricted diffusion on dwi images.

• lymphoma
• gbm (glioblastoma)
83 year old woman with a history of breast cancer.
family noted she has recently become disoriented and forgetful.
